# VerticalPageTabViewStyle.TransitionStyle

**Structure**

A transition style used between tabs.

## Declaration

```swift
struct TransitionStyle
```

## Getting the transition styles

- **automatic**: Automatic transition style
- **blur**: A transition style that blurs content between each tab
- **identity**: A transition style that has no animation between each tab

## Creating the tab view style

- **init()**
- **init(transitionStyle:)**: Creates a new `VerticalPageTabViewStyle` with a transition style.

items.description: A transition style that blurs content between each tab
items.name: blur

items.description: A transition style that has no animation between each tab
items.name: identity

items.description: Creates a new `VerticalPageTabViewStyle` with a transition style.
items.name: init(transitionStyle:)
